wsdl:definitions.wsdl:documentation: Web service for ConfigMgr Current Branch developed by Nickolaj Andersen (v1.3.0)

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMPrimaryUserByDevice
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get primary user(s) for a specific device

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMPrimaryDeviceByUser
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get primary device(s) for a specific user

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMDeployedApplicationsByUser
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get deployed applications for a specific user

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMDeployedApplicationsByDevice
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get deployed applications for a specific device

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMHiddenTaskSequenceDeployments
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get all hidden task sequence deployments

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMDeviceResourceIDByUUID
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get resource id for device by UUID (SMSBIOSGUID)

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMDeviceResourceIDByMACAddress
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get resource id for device by MAC Address

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMUnknownComputerResourceIDByUUID
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get resource id for a built-in unknown computer object by UUID (SMSBIOSGUID)

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMDeviceNameByUUID
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get the name of a specific device by UUID (SMBIOS GUID)

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMHiddenTaskSequenceDeploymentsByResourceId
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get hidden task sequence deployments for a specific resource id

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMBootImageSourceVersion
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get Boot Image source version

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMDiscoveredUsers
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get all discovered users

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMUniqueUserName
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get the unique username for a specific user (useful for setting a value for SMSTSUdaUsers)

wsdl:operation.name: ImportCMComputerByMacAddress
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Import a computer by MAC Address

wsdl:operation.name: ImportCMComputerByUUID
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Import a computer by UUID (SMBIOS GUID)

wsdl:operation.name: AddCMComputerToCollection
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Add a computer to a specific device collection (creates a direct membership rule)

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMDeviceCollections
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get all or a filtered list of device collections

wsdl:operation.name: UpdateCMCollectionMembership
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Update membership of a specific collection

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMDriverPackageByModel
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get Driver Package information by computer model

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMPackage
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get a filtered list of packages

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMUnknownDeviceByUUID
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Check for 'Unknown' device record by UUID (SMBIOS GUID)

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMOSImageVersionForTaskSequence
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieve the associated OS Image version for a specific task sequence (supports multiple images)

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveCMUnknownDeviceByUUID
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Delete 'Unknown' device record by UUID (SMBIOS GUID)

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveCMDeviceFromCollection
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Remove a device from a specific collection (only for Direct Membership rules

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveCMLastPXEAdvertisementForDevice
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Remove last PXE advertisement for a specific device

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveCMLastPXEAdvertisementForCollection
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Remove last PXE advertisement for a specific collection

wsdl:operation.name: AddCMComputerAssociationForUser
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Add a computer association between a source and destination device for a single user

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveCMComputerAssociation
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Remove a computer association between a source and destination device

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMApplicationDeploymentsByCollectionID
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get deployed applications by collection ID

wsdl:operation.name: GetCMCollectionsForDeviceByUUID
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get all collections a specific device is a member of by UUID (SMBIOS GUID)

wsdl:operation.name: SetADOrganizationalUnitForComputer
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Move a computer in Active Directory to a specific organizational unit

wsdl:operation.name: SetADComputerManagedBy
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Set ManagedBy attribute for a specific computer with specified user name

wsdl:operation.name: AddADComputerToGroup
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Add a computer in Active Directory to a specific group

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveADComputerFromGroup
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Remove a computer in Active Directory from a specific group

wsdl:operation.name: SetADComputerDescription
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Set the description field for a computer in Active Directory

wsdl:operation.name: GetADSiteNameByIPAddress
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get the Active Directory site name by IP address

wsdl:operation.name: GetMDTRoles
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get MDT roles from database (Application Pool identity needs access permissions to the specified MDT database)

wsdl:operation.name: GetMDTComputerByAssetTag
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get computer by asset tag from MDT database

wsdl:operation.name: GetMDTComputerByMacAddress
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Check if a computer with a specific MAC address exists in MDT database

wsdl:operation.name: GetMDTComputerBySerialNumber
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get computer by serial number from MDT database

wsdl:operation.name: GetMDTComputerByUUID
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Check if a computer with a specific UUID exists in MDT database

wsdl:operation.name: GetMDTDetailedComputerRoleMembership
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get MDT roles with detailed information for a specific computer

wsdl:operation.name: GetMDTComputerRoleMembership
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get a list of MDT roles for a specific computer

wsdl:operation.name: GetMDTComputerNameByIdentity
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Get MDT computer name by computer identity

wsdl:operation.name: AddMDTRoleMemberByAssetTag
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Add computer identified by an asset tag to a specific MDT role

wsdl:operation.name: AddMDTRoleMemberBySerialNumber
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Add computer identified by a serial number to a specific MDT role

wsdl:operation.name: AddMDTRoleMemberByMacAddress
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Add computer identified by a MAC address to a specific MDT role

wsdl:operation.name: AddMDTRoleMemberByUUID
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Add computer identified by an UUID to a specific MDT role

wsdl:operation.name: AddMDTRoleMember
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Add computer to a given MDT role (supports multiple indentification types)

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveMDTComputerFromRoles
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Remove MDT computer from all associated roles

wsdl:service.name: ConfigMgr_x0020_WebService
wsdl:service.wsdl:documentation: Web service for ConfigMgr Current Branch developed by Nickolaj Andersen (v1.3.0)
